summary: A group of bikers, heading to a race, become stranded in the desert and find themselves fighting off a family of inbred cannibals who live off the land.
cast: Robert Houston|David Nichols|Virginia Vincent|James Whitworth|Suze Lanier-Bramlett|Tamara Stafford|Kevin Spirtas|John Laughlin|Willard E. Pugh|Peter Frechette|Colleen Riley|Penny Johnson Jerald|Janus Blythe|Lance Gordon|Brenda Marinoff|Martin Speer|Edith Fellows|Arden Roger Meyer|Michael Berryman|John Bloom|Nicholas Worth
